name: Macro-2
body:
### Welcome to Macro-2 Page.
Macro-2 is the second version of a simple mouse and keyboard recording program. It records keyboard and mouse input and then plays it back in the exact same way that it was recorded.

### Current Features



### Authors and Contributors
Andy Keech (@pwnedpixel)

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? Check out our [documentation](https://help.github.com/pages) or [contact support](https://github.com/contact) and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
